body.name: Novilla Queen Mattress, 12 Inch Hybrid Mattress in a Box, Bamboo Charcoal Foam with Individual Pocket Springs for a Peaceful Sleep, Queen Size Mattress, Pillow Top Mattress with Quilted Cover
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 43 mins
features: POCKET COILS DESIGN FOR UNDISTURBED SLEEP - The Novilla 12 inch queen mattress features an individual pocket coils spring system features a silent design that effectively reduces tossing and turning, allowing you to enjoy a peaceful and comfortable sleep condition. It balances your body weight, keeps spinal health, and relieves pains. This queen size mattress always gives you a quieter and deeper sleep experience.

CERTIPUR-US CERTIFIED FOAM ENSURES HEALTHY SLEEP - The Novilla queen size mattress 12-inch equipped with a 3-layer CertiPUR-US certified foam, they are cooling gel memory foam, high-density supportive foam, and bamboo charcoal foam, which are natural and eco-friendly foam, it constants temperature, avoiding moisture, reduces motion transfer from others sleeping next to you, is conducive to maintaining health.

FITS THE HUMAN BODY CURVE & QUILTED KNITTED COVER - This Novilla 12-inch mattress in queen size is designed according to the human body curve, provides support that fits the body curves more closely, effectively relieves the body pressure, improves the quality of sleep. The queen pillow top mattress's cover is quilted & knitted, it features an OEKO-TEX certification, which keeps the mattress top breathable and clean.

SUITABLE FOR MOST BASES AND FRAMES - The 12" queen-size pillow top hybrid mattress measures 80" L x 60" W x 12" H, which is compatible with most bed frames, you can even place the mattress on the floor directly without a frame. Unbox the mattress and let it inflate for about 72 hours for full expansion.

10-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY - Shop with confidence from Novilla, as our queen medium-soft mattress comes with a 100-night sleep trial and a 10-year limited warranty. Should you encounter any issues, please contact our customer support team at any time.
body.description: Novilla Hybrid Mattress - A COZY HOME MADE SIMPLE! Why choose Novilla Hybrid mattress?Clean, Dry, and Comfortable Sleep experience - Hybrid helps regulate moisture, temperature, and odors, and can guarantee a clean and restful sleep environment.Edge Support - Hybrid offers good edge support, no worry about sinking or rolling off while you sit on the mattress edge.Ideal For Any Sleeping Positions -Designed according to the human body curve, helps eliminate pressure points, balances support from head to toe and offers quality sleep.CertiPUR-US Certified - The Hybrid infused is CertiPUR-US certified, it is safe and provides you and your family a healthy sleep.No Risk - 100-night sleep trial and 10-year limited warranty, shop from Novilla with confidence.What is inside the box?1x Novilla 12 inch queen Hybrid mattress 1x Novilla mattress opener 1x Novilla manual card Warm reminder:A slight odor from the new mattress is harmless and will dissipate after a short time.Everyone has their own view of firmness. We recommend giving your new Novilla mattress a chance to be used to your sleep position within a few weeks. If you still can't sleep well, please contact us freely at any time, we are always on standby to assist you.Please Give your Novilla mattress 72 hours at least to fully expand to its original shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am delighted with my Novilla Queen Size Mattress! Purchased it to replace my 20 years old mattress. Feel the difference immediately. On the manual says that it needs three days to fully expand. It actually expanded remarkably fast in just 24 hours, showcasing its high-quality build (maybe also because the stocking time is short, so it takes less time than normal to recover). The materials used are good, no chemical smell at all. The pillow top is incredibly soft, providing a luxurious and comfortable surface to sleep on. The mattress is actually medium firm, boasts a 3-zoned ergonomic design catering to all sleeping positions. The cooling gel memory foam and bamboo charcoal foam layers deliver a refreshing and supportive sleep experience. The manufacture says that it may take 100 days before getting used to a new mattress, but our family fall in love with new mattress in just several nights sleeping on it. With a 10-year limited warranty, Novilla stands behind their product, assuring long-term satisfaction. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t expect much for the price ．But this is a very comfortable mattresse.We have slept very well.It’s have very good support for the body but not hard .No weird sells.Easy of installation .Good value 。

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy to receive the mattress. After opening it, I found that it is what I need. The quality is also good, the softness and firmness are moderate. It makes me feel very comfortable. I hope my future experience will be better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have been sleeping well for two weeks. The combination of thickness and firmness met theneeds. I tried different sleep positions on it and the hybrid foams on top are supportive. I can relax with my back and shoulder with no issue. It delivered faster than the estimated time on Amazon. It was easy to unfold the mattress, it took a while for it to become fully bouncy and soft. The smell is friendly and it went away before I actually went to sleep the first night. For this price point, it’s definitely a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No smell, instant comfort, not hot
reviews.reviewText: Best mattress Ive ever owned for me, side sleeper with lots of shoulder/back problems. This mattress blew my mind on the first night, I have had it three nights now and last night I slept 7 hours on one side w/o tossing and turning.Incredible at any price point, but for <$300? Mind blown. No smell thanks to charcoal memory foam, incredibly soft pocket coils, no pressure points. Get this and a $300 adjustable frame and save yourself thousands over a similar configuration from a conventional bed store

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My boyfriend and I enjoy sleeping on this mattress and it really does help with lower back pain.
